title: ICE: librustc_const_eval/eval.rs: impossible case reached

labels.name: I-ICE
labels.description: Issue: The compiler panicked, giving an Internal Compilation Error (ICE) ❄️

body:
Code:

``` rust
fn f() {}
const C: fn() = f;

fn main() {
    match C {
        C => {}
        _ => {}
    }
}
```

ICEs on stable/beta/nightly.

Backtrace:
